name: 猜歌之王2—不用流量也能玩的猜谜游戏
name_original: 猜歌之王2—不用流量也能玩的猜谜游戏
description:
You are the wheat tyrants? You are singing God? You are music up to people?
Love songs? Love rock? Love all music?
New songs struck, once again experience the charm of music, song king return, radiant Can you wait? Come on, the new guess song experience, all in the "guess song king 2"
